name: Kleptonaut
description:
Kleptonaut is a puzzle game about robbing convenience stores in zero-gravity. Pick up and throw items to propel yourself, solve puzzles, and wreak havoc in Nova-Mart's numerous establishments.

Features

  • Top-down shooter style controls.
  • Engaging gameplay based on action/reaction physics.
  • Eight complete levels with a variety of puzzles.
  • A killer soundtrack by Kleptonaut himself.
  • Future updates inbound!

Team

  • Richard Mao - Lead Producer
  • Nick Warren - Lead Level Designer
  • James Thomason - Lead Gameplay Designer
  • Luke Lai - Lead Developer
  • Wesley Wu - 3D Artist
  • Christina Hanson - Graphic Designer
  • Jeff 'Kleptonaut' Shields - Composer
